title: You shouldn't mix up TFT ranked positions with Solo/Duo ranked position
body:
Just had a game with a support that was gold in TFT, but silver 1 in a gold 1/plat 4 game. Aren't they supposed to be around the same rank? Silver's a little far away from Gold 1 and Plat 4.

Riot please.

replies.body:
Wtf are you talking about? TFT has _nothing_ to do with SR, ranks are completely unrelated to eachother.

Rank also means basically nothing, people are matched by MMR.
